module.name: contextual_shape_positioning
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the shape and the position of a product version used in another product version. This module may be used to represent the shape of a component in an assembly.

inscope.li: replication of a geometric model through the application of a geometric transformation;
import of the representation of the shape of an occurrence of a component in a representation of the shape of the product that uses it.

uof.name: Contextual_shape_positioning
uof.description: The Contextual shape positioning UoF specifies constructs needed for the representation of the shape of a product version used in another product version.
